PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It was also worth noting that PIDT-C12NT showed much higher absorption coefficient than other two polymers in the whole visible area.

Let's think step by step.

1. Absorption coefficient - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to a physical property of an object or substance, in this case, the polymers being compared. The absorption coefficient is a measure of how much of a given type of radiation (in this case, visible light) is absorbed by a material.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: It was also worth noting that PIDT-C12NT showed much higher absorption coefficient than other two polymers in the whole visible area.

Let's think step by step.

1. "absorption coefficient"

The "absorption coefficient" is the "Property Value" entity in the given paragraph. It refers to the property of a material that describes how much of a particular wavelength of light it absorbs. In this case, the absorption coefficient of PIDT-C12NT is being compared to that of other polymers in the visible light spectrum.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
